description.value:
Activation: 0

Speaking quickly gets you out of trouble as often as it gets you into it, and you never miss a chance to get a word in edgewise.

Spend 2 focus to gain 2, which you can only use to make spiritual skill tests via the following actions: @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.A4fgvQ6HoxCIpxFS]{Use a Skill}, @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.8yQ5MMIrywehKyTS]{Gain Advantage}, or an action from any @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.qqa1ZgA957Cae6ex]{Agent} talent.

During a conversation or endeavor, at the GM’s discretion, you can instead use both 2 to make an additional contribution for the round.
